name: Office Template Creation
description: Detects creation of template files for Microsoft Office from outside Office
false_positives: Loading a user environment from a backup or a domain controller
query: (((file.path:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Tt][Ff]/) AND file.path:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/) OR (file.path:(/.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx]/) AND file.path:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/)) AND (NOT (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((file.path:(*.dot OR *.dotm OR *.doc OR *.docm OR *.docx OR *.rtf) AND file.path:*\\Microsoft\\Word\\Startup*) OR (file.path:(*.xlt OR *.xltm OR *.xls OR *.xlsm OR *.xlsx) AND file.path:*\\Microsoft\\Excel\\Startup*)) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\WINWORD.exe OR *\\EXCEL.exe))))`
